mapper.select:
select
from
and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and user_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{userId}), '%') and mobile_no like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mobileNo}), '%') and name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%') and address like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{address}), '%') and status like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{status}), '%') and country like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{country}), '%') and province like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{province}), '%') and city like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{city}), '%') and street like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{street}), '%') and detail like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{detail}), '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into
( tenant_id, user_id, mobile_no, name, address, country, province, city, street, detail) values
( #{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.mobileNo}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.country}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.street}, #{entity.detail})

insert into
( tenant_id, user_id, mobile_no, name, address, status, country, province, city, street, detail) values
(#{entity.tenantId},#{entity.userId},#{entity.mobileNo},#{entity.name},#{entity.address},#{entity.status},#{entity.country},#{entity.province},#{entity.city},#{entity.street},#{entity.detail})
on duplicate key update tenant_id=values(tenant_id), user_id=values(user_id), mobile_no=values(mobile_no), name=values(name), address=values(address), status=values(status), country=values(country), province=values(province), city=values(city), street=values(street), detail=values(detail)
